body: I based this off the arborx test, which creates a build directory underneath the install prefix. It looks like some of the other test packages (e.g. openmpi) do this as well. I think that to avoid contaminating the installation, and to allow non-installing users to test, *and* to improve reproducibility, it would be good to add a facility to generate a temporary testing prefix inside the spack temporary directory if possible.
title: ForTrilinos: add smoke test
